portfolio.heading: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A journey through albums, singles, and artistic collaborations. Each song a story, each record a chapter in an ever-evolving musical narrative that spans genres and emotions.
services.title: Professional Expertise
services.description: Music production, songwriting, and live session recording. From concept to final mix, every detail crafted with precision and artistic vision.
services.production.title: Production & Arrangements
services.production.description: Complete music production from concept to final mix, with sophisticated arrangements that bring your vision to life.
services.songwriting.title: Songwriting & Composition
services.songwriting.description: Original compositions and collaborative songwriting that captures emotion and tells compelling musical stories.
services.sessions.title: Live Studio Sessions
services.sessions.description: Professional recording sessions with premium equipment and acoustically treated spaces for pristine audio capture.
sessions.title: Casimiro Sessions Live Recording
sessions.label: Live Experiences
sessions.subtitle: Sessions
sessions.description: Intimate audiovisual performances, recorded live with soul and detail. Where music meets visual poetry in carefully curated moments of artistic expression.
